title: 5 minutes from death : Dancing with the Devil
author: Demi Lovato
description:
“I knew that what I’d been looking for, I hadn’t found yet. But what I had been looking for was not in the form of a drug.”
Demi and her closest confidants give a firsthand account of the aftermath of the overdose as she wakes up in the hospital after being minutes away from death.

Episode 3 available March 30 @ 12p PT

Resources:
 
SAMHSA Hotline for individuals and family members facing mental health and/or substance use disorders
1-800-662-HELP (4357) 
TTY: 1-800-487-4889 
 
National Sexual Assault Hotline
www.rainn.org
1-800-656-HOPE (4673)
 
Or if you need immediate support, please reach out to your local crisis text line:
USA: Text HOME to 741741
UK: Text SHOUT to 85258
Canada: Text CONNECT to 686868 or 741741
 
Learn how to save lives at endoverdose.net.

Pre-order Demi Lovato’s new album ‘Dancing With The Devil… The Art Of Starting Over’ https://DemiLovato.lnk.to/DWTDTAOSOID

localize.description:
"我知道，我一直在寻找的东西，我还没有找到。但我一直在寻找的东西并不是以毒品的形式出现的。"
黛米和她最亲密的知己亲身讲述了吸毒过量后的第一手资料，她在医院醒来时，离死亡只有几分钟的距离。

第3集于3月30日太平洋时间12点播出

TTY：1-800-487-4889。

www.rainn.org
1-800-656-HOPE (4673)
 
或者如果您需要立即支持，请联系您当地的危机短信热线。
美国：发短信HOME到741741
英国。发短信SHOUT到85258
加拿大。发短信CONNECT到686868或741741。

预购Demi Lovato的新专辑《与魔鬼共舞......重新开始的艺术》https://DemiLovato.lnk.to/DWTDTAOSOID。

"我知道，我一直在尋找的東西，我還沒有找到。但我一直在尋找的東西並不是以毒品的形式出現的。"
黛米和她最親密的知己親身講述了吸毒過量後的第一手資料，她在醫院醒來時，離死亡只有幾分鐘的距離。

第3集於3月30日太平洋時間12點播出
